Fisherman Fibbs:
Wow! Hello! My name is Phoebs. I'm a fisherman.
From early childhood, parents said that fishing is too dangerous ... But I really like it. Is it possible to refuse such a pleasant lesson? Hehehehe.
Do not want to go fishing? By the way, you heard about Special Bait of Hein and the Shining Magic Bait?
I can exchange them for bait coupon.
Oh yes! This time I managed to get a special bait. If you collect Hain's Fishing Coins, then I will exchange them for Elite Fishing Rod. A real fisherman should not miss such a chance!
Coins can be found in Chest of Hein with Treasures and the Shining Magic Chest, which can be caught on The special bait of Hain and the Brilliant Magic Bait.
